endpoints.description: Create and configure a new resource within the cloud ecosystem.
Retrieve a list of all active resources, including their current states and configurations.
Update the configuration settings of a specific resource with the given identifier.
Remove the specified resource from the system, ceasing its functionalities.
Fetch performance metrics and utilization statistics for a specific resource.
Increase the capacity of a specific resource to manage greater workloads.
Decrease the capacity of a specific resource to conserve operational costs.
List all alerts or notifications related to resource thresholds and system statuses.
Reinitialize the specified resource to ensure consistent operation following modifications.
Verify the overall operational status and health of the service infrastructure.
